# eui-col

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                                       | Type                      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- | ----------- |
| `lg`         | `lg`          | sets all parameters of the component for below lg breakpoint when an object is passed or sets the span of the component when number is passed     | `ColDescriptor \| number` | `undefined` |
| `lgOffset`   | `lg-offset`   | sets left of the col proportionately to the spans of the parent for below lg breakpoint                                                           | `number`                  | `undefined` |
| `lgOrder`    | `lg-order`    | sets the ordering of the columns for below lg breakpoint                                                                                          | `number`                  | `undefined` |
| `lgSpan`     | `lg-span`     | sets the width of the col according to the parent row's `spans` for below lg breakpoint                                                           | `number`                  | `undefined` |
